attributes.action: To transport prisoners with a life sentence to an isolated island
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Request that the government transports all persons sentenced to life imprisonment to an isolated island off of the british coast (Hebrides or Shetlands) where they will be left to fend for themselves, to do as they wish without cost to the British taxpayer. Navy ships to guard and deter escapes.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
